How To Join ACMW @ RPI

To become a member of The Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute Student Chapter of the Association for Computing Machinery for Women, all you have to do is fill out this form. By signing up you will also be subscribed to our chapter's email list, in which we will send out communications about out GBMs and other events.

We highly encourage that you register as a member of the nationally recognized Association For Computing Machinery Organization. Student registration can be done here . ACM Membership dues for students are about $20/year*.

Becoming part of the RPI Chapter of ACM-W provides many benefits, some of which include exclusive networking opportunities and access to some speciconference sponsorships.


*If you are in need of financial assistance to pay official ACM-W membership fees please contact our student leadership at acmw.rpi@gmail.com.
